definition: one's bosom (the seat of emotions)/breast/broad-minded and open/to think about/to cherish
bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)

sentences.english: Qin Shan people, with great mind, are stretch out their arms greeting friends from all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 秦山人以博大胸懷，張開雙臂迎接世界朋友的到來。

sentences.english: Seeds are open - minded, drink a heaven-sent "holy water."
sentences.chinese: 種子們放開胸懷，暢飲着天賜的“聖水”。

sentences.english: The red star flickers, warming our hearts.
The Summer Resort is vast and magnificent, which reflects the broad-minded ideals of Emperor Kangxi and Emperor Qianlong.
sentences.chinese: 避暑山莊園林宏偉闊大，體現了康乾兩帝的寬闊胸懷。

sentences.english: I appreciate your generosity in the matter.
sentences.chinese: 我很欣賞你在這件事上表現出來的寬大胸懷。

sentences.english: Whlie the sun, like my breath dancing in my gentle chest.
sentences.chinese: 當陽光象我的呼吸，在溫柔的胸懷裏跳蕩。

sentences.english: That the influential official also certainly has many person is good , breast is such as magnanimous.
sentences.chinese: 當然權貴也有很多人是不錯的，諸如胸懷坦蕩的。

sentences.english: Therefore, kind Jesus, since I cannot pay thee.
sentences.chinese: 啊，仁慈耶穌，爲願依你胸懷。

sentences.english: Sometimes, the narrowminded people make me frustrated.
sentences.chinese: 胸懷狹小的人，有時使我氣餒。

sentences.english: Open your heart and see, I SAVED YOUR LIFE.
sentences.chinese: 放開胸懷看看吧，我救了你的性命。

sentences.english: Leila Help-minded politicians and historical sense of responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 說明磊落的政治家的胸懷和歷史的責任感。

sentences.english: With great wisdom and broad bosom.
sentences.chinese: 依憑博大的智慧和寬廣的胸懷。

sentences.english: We shouldgive, because we already have the feeling having everything already.
sentences.chinese: 我們應該去付出，因爲我們已經具有胸懷天下的感覺。

sentences.english: The young people should keep the Motherland in mind and look to the whole world.
sentences.chinese: 當代青年應該胸懷祖國，放眼世界。

sentences.english: Tonghui People, with open mind, embrace the world.
sentences.chinese: 通惠人，敞開胸懷，擁抱世界。

sentences.english: There are no politics, only the poet's feelings of passion for the country.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏沒有政治，只有詩人胸懷祖國的情懷。

definition: a sage/wise and holy man/virtuous ruler/Buddhist lama/wine
